news.title: Stanford’s star reporter takes on Silicon Valley’s ‘money-soaked’ startup culture
news.summary: His reporting on a Stanford University president put Theo Baker on the map, but his upcoming book may cement his reputation as the rare young journalist willing to challenge Silicon Valley's startup machine.
